original_text: If the master marries another woman as well, he must still take care of the first woman. He must continue to give her food and clothes. He must not refuse to sleep with her.
korean_text: 만일 상전이 다른 여자에게 장가 들지라도 그 여자의 음식과 의복과 동침하는 것은 끊지 말 것이요

sentences.original_text: If the master marries another woman
he must still take care of the first woman
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여전히 첫 번째 여자를 돌봐야 합니다

sentences.original_text: He must continue to give her food
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그녀에게 음식을 계속 주어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: He must not refuse to sleep with her
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그녀와 함께 자는 것을 거부해서는 안 됩니다
